LightningComponentBundle.description: Use this component with Lightning Knowledge on article detail pages or any other page where you want to display the content / body of an article from a Rich Text field on the article.

property.name: articleAPIName
property.label: Article API Name
property.description: Article (kav) API Name

property.name: articleBodyAPIName
property.label: Article Body (Rich Text) Field API Name
property.description: Article Body (Rich Text Area / HTML type) Field on Article object

property.name: body1CssClassesInput
property.label: Body 1 CSS Classes
property.description: Class names for div wrapper containing the body rich text

property.name: articleBodyAPIName2
property.label: Article Body (Rich Text) Field API Name 2
property.description: Article Body (Rich Text Area / HTML type) Field on Article object 2

property.name: body2CssClassesInput
property.label: Body 2 CSS Classes
property.description: Class names for div wrapper containing the body 2 rich text

property.name: showSecondBodyField
property.label: Display Second Body Field
property.description: If checked will display the article's second body field.

property.name: queryBy
property.label: Query By
property.description: Article Field to query / filter on

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Record Id value if Query By recordId is selected

property.name: urlName
property.label: URL Name
property.description: URL Name value if Query By urlName is selected

property.name: articleNumber
property.label: Article Number
property.description: Article Number value if Query By articleNumber is selected

property.name: showTitle
property.label: Show Title
property.description: If checked will display the article title.

property.name: titleStyle
property.label: Title Style
property.description: Style / CSS to apply to title

property.name: showArticleNumber
property.label: Show Article Number
property.description: If checked will display article number.

property.name: articleNumberStyle
property.label: Article Number Style
property.description: Style / CSS to apply to article number.

property.name: articleNumberText
property.label: Article Number Text
property.description: Text Label for Article Number.

property.name: showArticleViews
property.label: Show Article Views
property.description: If checked will display article total views.

property.name: articleViewsStyle
property.label: Article Views Style
property.description: Style / CSS to apply to article views.

property.name: articleViewsText
property.label: Article Views Text
property.description: Text Label for Article Views.

property.name: showTopics
property.label: Show Topics
property.description: If checked will display article topics section.

property.name: showVoting
property.label: Show Voting
property.description: If checked will display article voting section.

property.name: replaceSmartLinks
property.label: Replace Smart Links
property.description: If checked attempt to replace smart links.

property.name: smartLinksUrlPath
property.label: Smart Links Url Path
property.description: Url Path for Smart Links. Example: /articles/Knowledge/ (include '/' at start and end)

property.name: articlePageUrl
property.label: Article Page Url
property.description: Article Page Url in your site. Example: if your article page is /article/some-article-name then the page url is 'article'
